1.title: Baby Steps
1.plot: Years after the show that made him famous 'Captain Pugwash' ended, cartoon actor Harold Sullivan, is in therapy coping with his issues. When he is released from care, he attempts to regain his former celebrity status by any means necessary.

locations: Ealing Studios, Ealing, London, England, UK::(sound recording)
imdb.plot outline: Years after the show that made him famous 'Captain Pugwash' has ended, cartoon actor Harold Sullivan, is in therapy under the care of Dr Matilda Peacock coping with his 'issues.' When she releases him from her care Harold attempts to regain his former celebrity status by any means necessary.
imdb.title: Ink Shrink
plot: Set in the world of 'The Abbey' a hospital offering therapy to celebrities, jaded psychoanalyst, Dr Matilda Peacock is in a rut. Her once famous 'Coping with Anonymity' group are old news and have become more of a chore than a challenge.

Years after the show that made him famous 'Captain Pugwash' has ended, cartoon actor Harold Sullivan, is in therapy under the care of Dr Matilda Peacock coping with his 'issues.' When she releases him from her care Harold attempts to regain his former celebrity status by any means necessary.
